# ColumnSelection.all

**Case**

Select all columns in the data frame.

## Declaration

```swift
case all
```

## Column selection types

- **ColumnSelection.exclude(columnNames:)**: Selects all columns except the specified columns.
- **ColumnSelection.include(columnNames:)**: Selects only the specified columns.
- **ColumnSelection.numeric**: Select all numeric columns in the data frame.

items.description: Selects all columns except the specified columns.
items.name: ColumnSelection.exclude(columnNames:)

items.description: Select all numeric columns in the data frame.
items.name: ColumnSelection.numeric
